name: President Chainsaw (Early demo)
description:
This is a story on saving people's mind from being puppetized. The game is solo-developed with RPGM engine.

  • Unique Puppetized World - Society transformed into an alien world with people under control
  • Engaging Story - See how the main cast survives in this distorted world with philosophy thoughts put into the writings
  • Tactics Battle - Improved mechanics from the battle system in Final Fantasy Tactics and Disgaea.
  • Easy Leveling - No grinding really needed.
  • Best Girls/Best Boys - Well written dialogues to make you love the characters and story.
  • Face president of the world government with a chainsaw
  • No one really dies in this game

President Chainsaw is a crazy rpg game, in development, and Demo version available for Chapter 1 to Chapter 2.

FAQ: Why the inconsistency in style? Because it's still work in progress, it takes way too much time. -_-"
